content: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
author: Rumi
translation: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。

content: Courage is doing what you're afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you're scared.
author: Eddie Rickenbacker
translation: 行畏惧之事可谓勇；无畏则无勇。

content: Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
translation: 世界上任何伟业的成就都离不开热情。

content: Every sweet has its sour; every evil its good.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
translation: 甘饴有其酸涩，恶人亦有善行。

content: Faith doesn't mean you never doubt. It only means you never act upon your doubts.
author: Orson Scott Card
translation: 拥有信念并不代表毫无疑虑，它只意味着你从不带着疑虑行事。

content: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
author: Leo Tolstoy
translation: 生命中有了细小的变化，才算是真正地活着。

content: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
author: Goethe
translation: 我们越接近目标，就会遇到越多困难。

content: First find out what you are capable of, then decide who you are.
author: Tara Westover
translation: 先找出你的能力所在，然后再决定你是谁。

content: You must remember what you are and what you have chosen to become, and the significance of what you are doing.
author: John Williams
translation: 你必须记着自己是什么人，你选择要成为什么人，记住你正在从事的东西的重要意义。

content: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber
translation: 爱，就是你和某个人一起经历的一切。

content: Whomever you become, whatever you make yourself into, that is who you always were.
author: Tara Westover
translation: 无论你成为谁，无论你把自己变成了什么，那就是你本来的样子。

content: The sun always has ways to reach us.
author: Kazuo Ishiguro
translation: 太阳总有办法照到我们，不管我们在哪里。

content: Dads are most ordinary men turned by love into heroes, adventurers, story-tellers, and singers of songs.
author: Pam Brown
translation: 父亲们不过是群普通人，但爱让他们化身英雄、探险家、说书人和歌者。

content: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca
translation: 如果你不知道要驶向哪个港口，任何风向都毫无助益。

content: Plans to protect air and water, wilderness and wildlife are in fact plans to protect man.
author: Stewart Udall
translation: 那些保护空气、水和野生动物的计划，实际上是为了保护人类自己。

content: All of us, at certain moments of our lives, need to take advice and to receive help from other people.
author: Alexis Carrel
translation: 在生命的某些时刻，我们每个人都需要听取他人的意见，接受他人的帮助。

content: I'm not telling you it is going to be easy, I'm telling you it's going to be worth it.
author: Art Williams
translation: 我不会告诉你这个过程很容易。我只会说，这一切都是值得的。

content: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
author: Victor Hugo
translation: 生命如花，爱情是蜜。

content: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
author: Socrates
translation: 最重要的不是生命，而是美好的生命。

content: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett
translation: 成功不是你爬了多高，而是你如何为这个世界带来积极的影响。

content: Don't cry when the sun is gone, because the tears won't let you see the stars.
author: Violeta Parra
translation: 不要在太阳落下时哭泣，因为泪水会让你错过星星。

content: Ill habits gather unseen degrees, as brooks make rivers, rivers run to seas.
author: John Dryden
translation: 正如小溪汇聚成河流，河流汇入大海，坏习惯也会不知不觉积重难返。

content: The farther behind I leave the past, the closer I am to forging my own character.
author: Isabelle Eberhardt
translation: 我把过去抛得越远，便越接近于我自己锻造的自我。

content: Only an open heart will allow you to float equally between everyone.
author: Mitch Albom
translation: 唯有一颗坦诚的心才能使你平等地对待每个人。

content: The most wasted day of all is that on which we have not laughed.
author: Nicolas Chamfort
translation: 没有笑声的一天就是最虚度的一天。

content: Love is when you are as concerned about someone else's situation as you are about your own.
author: Mitch Albom
translation: 爱就是像关心自己一样去关心别人。

content: Anything looked at closely becomes wonderful.
author: A. R. Ammons
translation: 在近距离的观察下，任何事物都会显得美妙无比。

content: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
author: Mitch Albom
translation: 生命中最重要的是学会给予爱，同时也要学会接纳爱。

content: Health and cheerfulness naturally beget each other.
author: Joseph Addison
translation: 安康喜乐，相生相成。

content: Happiness is not a station you arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck
translation: 幸福并不是你所抵达的站点，而是一种旅行的方式。

content: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
author: George Bernard Shaw
translation: 幸福的家庭犹如人间天堂。

content: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou
translation: 所有伟大的成就都需要时间的历练。

content: You do not write your life with words. You write it with actions.
author: Patrick Ness
translation: 你不是用文字来书写你的人生的，而是用行动。

content: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
author: Maya Angelou
translation: 爱情不识藩篱。它将跨栏杆、越栅栏、穿围墙，满怀憧憬地抵达终点。

content: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
author: Saint Francis de Sales
translation: 没有什么比温柔更有力量，也没有什么比真正的力量更温柔。

content: You make a life out of what you have, not what you're missing.
author: Kate Morton
translation: 你是靠自己所拥有的，而不是所缺少的来过你的人生。

content: Never regret. If it's good, it's wonderful. If it's bad, it's experience.
author: Victoria Holt
translation: 永远别去后悔。若结果美好，那很精彩。若结果糟糕，那是经历。

content: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
author: Wayne Gretzky
translation: 你不去射门的话，就百分之百进不了球。

content: Life's a mixed bag, no matter who you are.
author: 《时空恋旅人》
translation: 生活总是喜忧参半，无论你是谁。

content: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
author: A.A. Milne
translation: 能拥有一些难以割舍的东西，这是多么幸运啊。

content: Dreams are like stars. You may never touch them, but if you follow them, they will lead you to your destiny.
author: Liam Payne
translation: 梦想就像星星。也许你永远无法触碰，但如果你跟随它们，它们将引领你找到人生的路。

content: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
author: A. Nielsen
translation: 与他人分享快乐，我们会收获加倍的快乐。

content: That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence — hard work.
author: David Beckham
translation: 克服自信低潮的艰难时期，我只用一个方法：努力。

content: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi
translation: 昨天的我聪明，所以我想改变世界；今天的我明智，所以我选择改变自己。

content: You've always had the power my dear, you just had to learn it for yourself.
author: 《绿野仙踪》
translation: 其实你一直有那份力量，你只是需要学着去使用它。

content: You don't love someone because they're perfect. You love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
author: Jodi Picoult
translation: 不是因为一个人完美你才爱，而是即使那人不完美你也会去爱。

content: What is right is not always popular, and what is popular is not always right.
author: Albert Einstein
translation: 对的事不见得都受欢迎，受欢迎的事不见得都是对的。

content: Just trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
translation: 相信自己就对了，你将知道如何过日子。

content: Be careful how you judge people, most of all friends. You don't sum up a man's life in one moment.
author: Al Pacino
translation: 小心你是怎么评判他人的，尤其是朋友。你不能在片刻间总结一个人的一生。

content: Dew turns into frost since tonight; the moon viewed at home is more bright.
author: 杜甫《月夜忆舍弟》（许渊冲 译）
translation: 露从今夜白，月是故乡明。

content: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
author: Beyonce Knowles
translation: 如果一切皆完美，你就永远不会学到东西，永远不会成长。

content: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.
author: 《小妇人》
translation: 我不惧怕暴风雨，因为我正在学习如何驾驭我的船。

content: So often people are working hard at the wrong thing. Working on the right thing is probably more important than working hard.
author: Caterina Fake
translation: 很多时候人们努力错了方向，在对的事情上努力可能比努力本身还重要。

content: The minute you think, 'Oh, this is how life is', life finds a way of surprising you.
author: 《爱宠大机密2》
translation: 当你想着“哦，生活就是这样的”的时候，生活总会给你带来惊喜。

content: It took me 17 years and 114 days to become an overnight success.
author: Lionel Messi
translation: 我花了17年又114天的时间才在一夕之间成功。

content: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday and I love today.
author: William Allen White
translation: 我不害怕明天，因为我经历过昨天，又热爱今天。

content: We can't all be heroes, because somebody has to sit on the curb and applaud when they go by.
author: Will Rogers
translation: 我们不可能都成为英雄，总得有人在英雄走过的时候坐在路边鼓掌。

content: Youth is happy because it has the capacity to see beauty. Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old.
author: Franz Kafka
translation: 青春之欢愉在于发现美的能力。而所有能发现美的人，会永远年轻。

content: Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
author: Ashton Kutcher
translation: 不要满足于生活赋予你的，要有所创造，让人生变得更好。

content: True self-discovery begins where your comfort zone ends.
author: Adam Braun
translation: 真正的自我发现，始于你踏出了你的舒适区。

content: Life isn't tied with a bow, but it's still a gift.
author: Regina Brett
translation: 生活没有打上蝴蝶结，但它仍是一份礼物。

content: We don't want to tell our dreams. We want to show them.
author: Cristiano Ronaldo
translation: 我们不想把梦想说出来，而是想展现出来。

content: The secret of discipline is motivation. When a man is sufficiently motivated, discipline will take care of itself.
author: Sir Alexander Paterson
translation: 自律的关键是动机，当一个人的动力足够时，他自然就能自律。

content: To fall in love with yourself is the first secret to happiness.
author: Robert Morley
translation: 爱上自己是通往幸福的第一条奥秘。

content: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
author: Elizabeth Foley
translation: 朋友间最美妙的经历，莫过于成长道路不同，却并不因此生出隔阂。

content: To accept ourselves as we are means to value our imperfections as much as our perfections.
author: Sandra Bierig
translation: 所谓接受自己，意味着既重视自己的完美，也珍视自己的不完美。

content: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
author: Martin Buber
translation: 动物的眼睛有一种神奇的力量，诉说着千言万语。

content: Let your joy be in your journey — not in some distant goal.
author: Tim Cook
translation: 让你的喜悦来自旅途中，而非一个遥远的目标。

content: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
author: William Arthur Ward
translation: 温暖的笑容是放之四海皆准的善意表达。

content: Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
author: Seneca
translation: 去新的地方旅行，能让思维焕发新的活力。

content: Do you want to meet the love of your life? Look in the mirror.
author: Byron Katie
translation: 想见见你的毕生所爱吗？看看镜中吧。

content: A poet is a man who puts up a ladder to a star and climbs it while playing a violin.
author: Edmond de Goncourt
translation: 诗人就是对着星空搭起天梯，然后边向上爬边拉小提琴的人。

content: Until you start believing in yourself, you ain't gonna have a life.
author: Rocky Balboa
translation: 直到你开始相信自己，你的人生才真正开始。

content: ㅤ
author: ㅤ
translation: ㅤ

content: Don't tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
author: Paul Brandt
translation: 别对我说天空就是极限，毕竟连月球上都有了人类的脚印。

content: The best day of your life is the one on which you decide your life is your own.
author: Bob Moawad
translation: 你生命中最美好的一天，就是你决定让你的人生属于你自己的那一天。

content: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.
author: Kahlil Gibran
translation: 你可能会忘记和你一同笑过的人，却会永远记得和你一同哭过的人。

content: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair
translation: 你想要的一切，都在恐惧的彼端。

content: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
translation: 二十年后，比起你做过的事，你会更遗憾于那些你没有去做的事。

content: When life is sweet, say thank you and celebrate. And when life is bitter, say thank you and grow.
author: Shauna Niequist
translation: 日子愉快时，道声谢谢，庆贺吧；日子苦难时，道声谢谢，成长吧。

content: Speak your mind even if your voice shakes.
author: Maggie Kuhn
translation: 勇敢说出你的想法，哪怕声音会颤抖。

content: There is meaning in every journey that is unknown to the traveler.
author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer
translation: 每段旅程里都有不为旅行者所知的意义。

content: Rivers know this: there is no hurry. We shall get there some day.
author: A. A. Milne
translation: 河流知道这一点：无需匆忙。我们终有一日会到达。

content: Growth begins when we begin to accept our own weakness.
author: Jean Vanier
translation: 成长始于接受自己的弱点。

content: It is love that will heal you. It is what heals us all.
author: 《沉睡魔咒2》
translation: 爱会治愈你，会治愈我们所有人。

content: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
author: William Butler Yeats
translation: 教育不是注满一桶水，而是点燃一把火。

content: Friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
translation: 友谊是鲜活的玫瑰，每一道褶皱里都溢着甜香。

content: One never knows what each day is going to bring. The important thing is to be open and ready for it.
author: Henry Moore
translation: 谁也不知道每一天都会带来什么。重要的是要敞开心扉，做好准备。

content: One of the best things in life is seeing a smile on a person's face and knowing that you put it there.
author: Lisa Drakeford
translation: 人生最美妙的事情，莫过于看到他人脸上的笑容，是因你而起。

content: Live each day as if your life had just begun.
author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe
translation: 把每天，都当作生命刚开始一样去过吧！

content: Gardens are not made by sitting in the shade.
author: Rudyard Kipling
translation: 光在树荫下坐着，是建不成花园的。

content: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
author: Luis Galarza
translation: 当你不再找借口，成功才会到来。

content: Your relationship with yourself sets the tone for every other relationship you have.
author: Robert Holden
translation: 你和你自己的关系，会奠定你其他任何一段关系的基调。

content: Everyone shines, given the right lighting.
author: Susan Cain
translation: 在合适的光源下，每个人都会发光。

content: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
author: Sean Patrick Flanery
translation: 你今天做的事要让未来的你心存感激。

content: It's not so much how busy you are, but why you are busy.
author: Mary Flannery O'Connor
translation: 重要的不是你有多忙，而是你为何而忙。

content: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
translation: 只要严于自律，大部分事情都可能做成。

content: Life is a dream. Realize it.
author: Mother Teresa
translation: 生活是一个梦想，实现它。

content: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray
translation: 筑造你自己的梦想吧，否则别人会雇你去建造他们的梦想。

content: A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
author: William Arthur Ward
translation: 温暖的笑容是放之四海皆准的善意表达。

content: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Dan Millman
translation: 改变的秘诀，是集中所有精力去建造新的东西，而非与过去抗衡。

content: It is not beauty that endears, it's love that makes us see beauty.
author: Leo Tolstoy
translation: 并非美丽招人爱，而是爱让我们看到了美丽。

content: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
author: William James
translation: 悲观导致软弱，乐观带来力量。

content: No winter lasts forever; no spring skips its turn.
author: Hal Borland
translation: 没有一个冬天不可逾越，没有一个春天不可来临。

content: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
translation: 感恩不仅是最伟大的美德，而且是所有美德之母。

content: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
translation: 一旦你下定决心，整个宇宙都会来帮你实现它。

content: Problems are not stop signs; they are guidelines.
author: Robert Schuller
translation: 问题的出现不是让你止步，而是给你指路。

content: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
author: George Bernard Shaw
translation: 使我们明智的不是对过去的回忆，而是对未来的责任。

content: Make the best use of what is in your power, and take the rest as it happens.
author: Epictetus
translation: 尽全力做到最好，接受接下来会发生的。

content: We must be willing to get rid of the life we planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
author: Joseph Campbell
translation: 我们必须放下规划好的人生，才能拥抱正在等待我们的生活。

content: Enjoy when you can, and endure when you must.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
translation: 有福享受时，尽情享受；必须承受时，默默忍受。

content: While there's life, there is hope.
author: Stephen Hawking
translation: 生命不息，希望不止。

content: Be true to your word and your work and your friend.
author: John Boyle O'Reilly
translation: 对诺言要信守，对工作要尽责，对朋友要忠诚。

content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau
translation: 成功往往会降临在那些忙得没空寻找它的人身上。

content: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson
translation: 把恐惧留在自己心里，把勇气给大家分享。

content: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Gandhi
translation: 珍惜生活，就像死神即将来临；热爱学习，就像生命能够永恒。

content: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.
author: Miguel de Cervantes
translation: 自己能挣到的，就别去乞求。

content: The only source of knowledge is experience.
author: Albert Einstein
translation: 经验是知识的唯一来源。

content: To be mature means to face, and not evade, every fresh crisis that comes.
author: Fritz Kunkel
translation: 成熟意味着去面对任何来临的危机，而不是逃避。

content: He who controls others may be powerful, but he who has mastered himself is mightier still.
author: 老子
translation: 胜人者有力，自胜者强。

content: Never promise more than you can perform.
author: Publilius Syrus
translation: 不要许下你无法兑现的承诺。

content: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
author: Voltaire
translation: 评判一个人的依据是他所提的问题，而非他给出的答案。

content: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford
translation: 当一切于你皆不利时，请记住，飞机也是逆风起飞的。

content: Nothing happens until something moves.
author: Albert Einstein
translation: 无为必将无获。

content: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
author: George Santayana
translation: 就算最聪明的头脑也需要学习。

content: Things do not change. We change.
author: Henry David Thoreau
translation: 万物并没有改变，变的是我们。

content: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
author: Emerson
translation: 生活就是实验，实验的次数越多你就做得越好。

content: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving; we get stronger and more resilient.
author: Steve Maraboli
translation: 生活从未变得更加轻松或宽容，是我们在一点一点变强、变坚韧。

content: You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.
author: Paulo Coelho
translation: 既然无法逃避自己的心，不如就好好地听听它在说些什么。

content: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost
translation: 找到出口的最好方式就是一路走到底。

content: Ideas shape the course of history.
author: 约翰·梅纳德·凯恩斯
translation: 想法影响着历史进程。

content: It's supposed to be hard. If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it.
author: 《红粉联盟》
translation: 要做成一件事情本来就不容易，要是不难，岂不是谁都会去做？

content: Give light and people will find the way.
author: Ella Baker
translation: 给予光亮，人们就能找到前方的路。

content: All your lights are red, but I'm green to go.
author: Troye Sivan
translation: 你哪怕示以红灯拒我前行，我也会心向绿灯一刻不停。

content: Do not linger to gather flowers to keep them, but walk on, for flowers will keep themselves blooming all your way.
author: 泰戈尔
translation: 不要流连于采集花朵，只管向前走，一路上自会有百花盛开。

content: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously.
author: 埃莉诺·罗斯福
translation: 如果人诚实、勇敢地面对生活，就能从经历中获得成长。

content: I have crossed oceans of time to find you.
author: 《惊情四百年》
translation: 我跨越了时间的瀚海来把你寻找。

content: You can't sweep other people off their feet, if you can't be swept off your own.
author: Clarence Day
translation: 如果你自己都不欣赏自己，别人也不会为你倾倒。

content: Not having the best situation, but seeing the best in your situation is the key to happiness.
author: Marie Forleo
translation: 快乐的关键在于，即便境遇不是最佳，但依然能看到处境中最好的一面。

content: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another.
author: Juvenal
translation: 自然与智慧永不相悖。

content: Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you are born to stand out？
author: 《水瓶座女孩》
translation: 你本就生而不凡，为何还要拼命去融入大众呢？

content: Do you know that there's still a chance for you？Cause there's a spark in you.
author: Katy Perry, "Firework"
translation: 你知道吗？你还有机会，因为你心中藏有火花。

content: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
author: Anatole France
translation: 人依靠行动而活，而非想法。

content: Even the darkest night will end, and the sun will rise.
author: 《悲惨世界》
translation: 即使再黑暗的夜也会走到尽头，旭日终将升起。

content: Feel the fear and do it anyway.
author: Susan Jeffers
translation: 感受恐惧，放胆去做。

content: Remember there's no such thing as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end.
author: Scott Adams
translation: 记住没有小善之举这回事，每一次善行都会激起无穷尽的连锁反应。

content: Life moves pretty fast. If you don't stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
author: 《春天不是读书天》
translation: 人生匆匆，如果不时常停下脚步四处瞧瞧，你可能就会错过它。

content: You don't have to bend until you break. You just have to get up.
author: Colbie Caillat, "Try"
translation: 你不必一味屈服，让自己受伤，你只需打起精神做自己。

content: We live in the world when we love it.
author: 泰戈尔
translation: 我们只有热爱这个世界，才算真正地活着。

content: Catch the moments of your life. Catch them while you're young and quick.
author: 《我们这一天》
translation: 趁你还年轻利落，把握住生命中的每一个瞬间吧。

content: Only one thing can make a soul complete, and that thing is love.
author: 《朗读者》
translation: 只有一样东西可以让灵魂完整，那就是爱。

content: In any given moment we have two options: to step forward into growth or to step back into safety.
author: Abraham Maslow
translation: 任何时刻我们都有两个选择：往前走向成长，或退后走向安全。

content: Life is a collection of moments. The idea is to have as many good ones as you can.
author: 《爱情限时恋未尽》
translation: 生命由一个个瞬间组成，宗旨就是尽可能多地拥抱美好瞬间。

content: Don't let other people get in the way of what you really want.
author: 《伦敦生活》
translation: 不要让别人妨碍你追求你真正想要的。

content: It's been my experience that you can nearly always enjoy something if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
author: 《小小安妮》
translation: 我的经验是，事情只要下定决心去享受，就基本都能享受。

content: When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be.
author: Clean Bandit, "Rather Be"
translation: 只要有你相伴，便无他处可比拟。

content: May your past be the sound of your feet upon the ground. Carry on.
author: Fun., "Carry On"
translation: 愿你的过去只是你前进步伐所踏出的声响，继续前行吧。

content: If you believe in yourself enough and know what you want, you're gonna make it happen.
author: Mariah Carey, "Make It Happen"
translation: 如果你足够自信，也知道自己想要什么，就一定会实现心中所想。

content: When you finally go back to your old hometown, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
author: Sam Ewing
translation: 当你终于重归故里，你会发现自己思念的，不是故乡，而是童年。

content: Sometimes a problem is just an opportunity in disguise.
author: 《蛇蝎女佣》
translation: 有时候问题不过是伪装起来的机会。

content: Life is short; the world is wide, and I want to make some memories.
author: 《妈妈咪呀2》
translation: 生命短暂，世界广阔，我想制造些回忆。

content: Whatever happens tomorrow, we've had today.
author: 《一天》
translation: 不管明天会发生什么，至少我们拥有今天。

content: How are you to imagine anything if the images are always provided for you?
author: 《超脱》
translation: 如果你能想到的东西都在眼前，你的思维又如何插上想象的翅膀呢？

content: It's strange. I felt less lonely when I didn't know you.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre
translation: 真是奇怪。在认识你之前，我没有感到过如此孤单。

content: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live. It is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
author: Oscar Wilde
translation: 过自己想要的生活不是自私，要求别人按自己的意愿生活才是。

content: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it.
author: Nora Roberts
translation: 不去追逐你所渴求的，你就永远也无法拥有它。

content: Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
translation: 家，是爱之所在。也许我们脚步渐远，但心从未离开。

content: It is not the destination so much as the journey, they say.
author: 《加勒比海盗4：惊涛怪浪》
translation: 人们说，旅行的目的地不如旅程来得重要。

content: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt
translation: 毋庸置疑，生活赋予的最好礼物就是有机会努力去做值得做的事情。

content: Good teachers, they inspire you, they entertain you, and you end up learning a ton even when you don't know it.
author: Nicholas Sparks
translation: 好的老师会激励你，给你带来欢乐，悄然无声地教会你很多东西。

content: Keep your head up in failure, and your head down in success.
author: Jerry Seinfeld
translation: 失败时，要高昂起头；成功时，要保持谦逊。

content: Praising what is lost makes the remembrance dear.
author: William Shakespeare
translation: 赞美已经失去的事物，让回忆变得惹人喜爱。

content: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
author: Barbara Bush
translation: 在我看来，团聚于家庭生活而言不可或缺。

content: Water can carve its way even through stone and when trapped, water makes a new path.
author: 《艺伎回忆录》
translation: 水滴能穿石，即便困于一隅，也能另辟蹊径。

content: You can tell a lot about a person by what's on their playlist.
author: 《再次出发之纽约遇见你》
translation: 通过一个人的播放列表，你可以了解到很多关于他的东西。

content: Our growth depends not on how many experiences we devour, but on how many we digest.
author: Ralph W. Sockman
translation: 成长靠的不是经历有多丰富，而是对过往经历的细细品味和领会。

content: Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.
author: Philip Stanhope
translation: 任何值得做的事，都值得将其做好。

content: A positive attitude will have positive results because attitudes are contagious.
author: Zig Ziglar
translation: 积极的态度会带来积极的结果，因为态度是具有感染力的。

content: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
author: Francis Bacon
translation: 沉默，好比睡眠，会滋养出智慧。

content: I wouldn't give up being myself for even one second.
author: 《摩登家庭》
translation: 我不会放弃做自己，哪怕一秒也不行。

content: Neither abstinence nor excess ever renders man happy.
author: 伏尔泰
translation: 不论是节制还是过度都不能给人带来快乐。

content: If we're kind and polite, the world will be right.
author: 《帕丁顿熊2》
translation: 如果我们温和善良、彬彬有礼的话，世界将会变美好。

content: The only real failure is the failure to try and the measure of success is how we cope with disappointment.
author: 《涉外大饭店》
translation: 唯一真正的失败是放弃尝试；衡量成功的标准是我们如何面对失望。

content: The time spent with you allowed me to feel again.
author: 《大洋之间的灯光》
translation: 与你共度的时光，让我重新苏醒。

content: If you want the best the world has to offer, offer the world your best.
author: Neale Donald Walsch
translation: 若想得到世界上最好的东西，先向世界展现最好的你。

content: I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.
author: 《爱在黎明破晓前》
translation: 我喜欢当我看向别处时他的目光停留在我身上的感觉。

content: You never know how far you can go unless you run.
author: 《一代骄马》
translation: 你如果不跑起来，就永远不知道自己能走多远。

content: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
author: Brian Tracy
translation: 一个清晰的愿景，加以明确计划的支持，会给你极大的信心和个人力量。

content: They say when you meet the love of your life, time stops, and that's true.
author: 《大鱼》
translation: 人们说当你遇上你的挚爱，时间会停止，事实的确如此。

content: Everybody's got a job to do, and I do mine as best I can.
author: 玛丽·马特林
translation: 每个人都有自己的事情要做，我会竭尽全力把属于自己的做好。

content: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers
translation: 即便你刚好处于正轨，如果你只坐在那里的话，还是会被撞翻。

content: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn
translation: 要么你主宰生活，要么让生活主宰你。

content: It's good to set limits for oneself, but there comes a moment when we must destroy what we have constructed.
author: Josef Koudelka
translation: 为自己设限是不错，不过有时候我们必须打破自己一手建立的一切。

content: The morning, which is the most memorable season of the day, is the awakening hour.
author: 梭罗
translation: 在一天之中，清晨最值得怀恋和纪念，这是一段让万物醒悟的光阴。

content: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: 福兰克林·罗斯福
translation: 幸福来源于收获时的欢乐和创作时的激动。

content: Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
author: Frank Zappa
translation: 不偏离常规，就无法取得进步。

content: Life is a sum of all your choices. So, what are you doing today?
author: Albert Camus
translation: 生活就是你所有选择的总和，那么，你今天要做什么？

content: Art doesn't have to do anything. It just has to be there for the fierce pleasure we take in doing it.
author: Raymond Carver
translation: 艺术不需要做什么。在我们从事艺术时，能让人感受到强烈的愉悦就够了。

content: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
author: Albert Camus
translation: 将一切奉献给当下，就是对未来的真正慷慨。

content: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
author: 班杰明‧迪斯雷利
translation: 我已做好最坏的打算，但仍期待最好的结果。

content: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
author: 尼尔·阿姆斯特朗
translation: 我相信每个人的心跳次数有限，所以我不想浪费任何一下。

content: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
author: 戴尔·卡内基
translation: 我们大部分人所拥有的勇气比我们梦想得到的要多得多。

content: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: 吉姆·罗恩
translation: 成功不外乎是每天对一些基本技能的操练。

content: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
author: 杰西卡·萨维奇
translation: 不管你实现了多少目标，总要定睛于下一个更远大的。

content: When there is a strong woman character in a story — that always grabs me.
author: 李安
translation: 有坚强的女性角色的故事总能抓住我的心。

content: Either move or be moved.
author: 艾泽拉·庞德
translation: 要么主动寻求改变，要么被动接受改变。

content: Do more of what makes you happy.
author: Carmel McConnell
translation: 多做些让你快乐的事。

content: When love and skill work together, expect a masterpiece.
author: 约翰·拉斯金
translation: 当热爱与技巧融为一体，就能孕育出杰作。

content: When we have become completely free of the need to judge, we will also become completely free of the fear of being judged.
author: Henri Nouwen
translation: 当我们无需评断别人时，就根本不用怕被别人评断了。

content: The more things you do, the more you can do.
author: 露西尔·鲍尔
translation: 你做的事情越多，能做到的事情就越多。

content: They invented hugs to let people know you love them without saying anything.
author: Bil Keane
translation: 拥抱，是让你一句话也不用说，就让别人知道你爱他们。

content: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
author: 拿破仑
translation: 对身体最好的治疗就是让头脑安静。

content: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
author: 迈克尔·考达
translation: 保持前进动力的方法就是，一直拥有更远大的目标。
